name: Cannot Adventure
description:
What is an adventurer that does not even have control over what they are capable of doing? Find out in this game of puzzling strategies, limited resources, overpowered combos, hand-drawn pixel graphics, and endless chaos, where you either become the hero, or simply Cannot Adventure.

Instructions:

1. Move with WASD.
... ...You really thought you have control over that?

1. Given six cards from a deck of plenty more, each representing an action of either movement, attack, or a combination of both, choose your next move wisely, as for every step you take, the enemies will advance as well.
2. Eliminate all adversaries to move on to the next floor, where stronger foes, larger hordes, and greater rewards await.
3. Between every floor, you are given two cards, with increasing probability to be rarer and more powerful, as a reward. Play a card in your hand as a sacrifice to welcome the new blood into your arsenal.
4. Some cards, although powerful, will discard themselves after a timer. There are even some that will bring down their neighbors with them.

Credit goes to:
Slay the Spire, Hearthstone, Crypt of the Necrodancer, and many other games for inspiring the gameplay;
